description:
Do you want to learn simple and free public relations and publicity plus a 90 day marketing plan so you sell more books, courses and services? You are in the right place because this high quality and interactive course by Louise Anne Maurice of 90 Day Guru E-Learning was created for you and recently updated April 1, 2016.

PR+ Marketing Plan for Coaches, Consultants, Online Teachers and Authors is for you if:

  • You see the money making potential of marketing your book, course or service as the only solution for your readers, students and clients but you want the best step-by-step guidance for how to get started.
  • You want self-publishing marketing best practices, marketing plan templates and marketing plan examples that have already been tested and proven to work.
  • You would like free publicity and public relations so that you can boost your book, course and program sales plus connect with your ideal target market prospects.
  • You would like to know how you can create a marketing plan that you'll follow without spending thousands of dollars.
  • You are ready to use publicity and public relations to easily sell your books, courses, coaching programs and consulting services.

*************************************************************************************************************

Why take PR+ Marketing Plan for Coaches, Consultants, Online Teachers and Authors?

  • This is why you are here because you want a marketing plan designed for Authors, Trainers, Coaches and Consultants so you can sell more in the shortest amount of time without it costing you a small fortune.
  • The best part is; every piece of free publicity advice, marketing plans and logical approach to public relations has been tested; none of this is theory.

**************************************************************************************************************

What is covered in PR+ Marketing Plan for Coaches, Consultants, Online Teachers and Authors?

  1. Discover the secrets of self publishing marketing for Authors, Trainers, Coaches and Consultants and learn how it can take your business to a new leveraged level; you sell more and work less.
  2. Learn the publicity plan that costs you nothing plus discover free publicity and free advertising that helps you sell more books, courses, services and programs.
  3. Uncover what public relations really is and how it can help you sell more books, courses, coaching programs and consulting services plus you will develop a public relations plan.
  4. Create a marketing plan plus be guided through examples of marketing plans including exercises that help you complete a strategic marketing plan for both online and offline.
  5. Walk away with a fully completed 90 day self-publishing marketing plan that helps you sell more books, courses, coaching programs and consulting services in less time.
  6. Receive public relations coaching and consulting designed for Authors, Trainers, Coaches and Consultants who are unsure about whether they are ready to step out into the spot-light and be famous.
  7. Follow a success formula to implement your self-publishing marketing, publicity and public relations plan so you sell more books, courses, coaching programs and consulting services.

****************************************************************************************************************

How does PR+ Marketing Plan for Coaches, Consultants, Online Teachers and Authors Benefit You?

  • In this course, you learn the exact steps you need to know to create a marketing plan to help you sell more books, courses, coaching programs and consulting services in a short amount of time.
  • You receive a marketing plan formula that you can follow for success.
  • You get easy marketing templates and examples that only a professional with my background can give you.
  • You get the inside track on what you need to do to succeed online plus what you need to do to follow through.
  • If that's something you would like to achieve, you have selected the right course to take. If you complete this entire course and implement everything you learn you will have a completed 90 day self-publishing marketing plan that you can follow to sell more books, courses, coaching programs and consulting services.
  • Remember, it doesn't matter if you are new or already in full swing, I've been there and I can show you exactly what you need to do to make it happen.

****************************************************************************************************************

When Can You Take PR+ Marketing Plan for Coaches, Consultants, Online Teachers and Authors?

  • What are you waiting for? If you’re looking for a course to learn simple and free public relations and publicity plus a 90 day marketing plan so you sell more books, courses and services, then look no further.
  • Start learning right now or take the course when it is convenient for you! The course can be accessed 24-7 from most devices with an internet connection.
  • Once a member of the course, you receive lecture updates, advice and coaching guidance for life; NO EXTRA COST TO YOU.
  • REMEMBER: If you are not completely satisfied, you can get a full money back refund, so long as you request it within 30 days of purchase – No questions asked.
  • Click on the "Take This Course" button and start learning instantly

****************************************************************************************************************

Still not convinced? Make sure you watch some of the FREE PREVIEWS available to learn more about the course and more about me your instructor. Plus you can check out some of the reviews. Here is just one of the many examples:

What people are saying about PR+ Marketing Plan for Coaches, Consultants, Online Teachers and Authors created by Louise Anne Maurice of 90 Day Guru E-Learning?

"Informative Hands-On Course - Excellent, engaging and lots of extra-goodies. I haven’t done a lot of marketing because it overwhelms me. This instructor shares a different yet simple approach to planning a 90 day marketing campaign plus shows the easy publicity and public relations. Great templates and material I will use over and over again."

************************************************************************************************************
